indexBanner.title: Crust
indexBanner.sub:
Crust Network,
Chain to Decentralized Cloud

content.text1: provides a decentralized storage network of Web3.0 ecosystem. It supports multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and exposes storage interfaces to application layer. Crust’s technical stack is also capable of supporting a decentralized computing layer. It is designed to build a decentralized cloud ecosystem that values data privacy and ownership.
content.text2: CRUST provides a decentralized storage network of Web3.0 ecosystem. It supports multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and exposes storage interfaces to application layer. Crust's technical stack is also capable of supporting a decentralized computing layer. It is designed to build a decentralized cloud ecosystem that values data privacy and ownership.

TEE.title: Meaningful Proof of Work
TEE.desc: Based on the TEE (Trusted Execution Environment) technology, Crust implements MPoW (Meaningful Proof of Work) mechanism to quantify meaningful storage resource usage and generate corresponding work report in a reliable way.

MPoW.title: Guaranteed PoS Consensus
MPoW.desc: Crust’s GPoS (Guaranteed Proof of Stake) derives from PoS consensus. It requires nodes to provide storage resources as a guarantee to obtain staking quota, and encourages users to stake their tokens to high quality nodes via guarantee operation to obtain staking income.

GPoS.title: Decentralized Cloud Storage Market
GPoS.desc: Crust’s DSM (Decentralized Storage Market) enables users to place storage orders on the chain, to get their data stored and distributed on Crust Network. With the back up of entire network, users can retrieve their data from everywhere at anytime.

indexproduct.title: Crust
indexproduct.content: Crust implements the incentive layer protocol for decentralized storage. It is adaptable to multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and provides support for the application layer. Crust's architecture also has the capability of supporting a decentralized computing layer and building a decentralized cloud ecosystem.
indexproduct.onecontent: Based on the TEE (Trusted Execution Environment) technology, Crust implements MPoW (Meaningful Proof of Work) mechanism to quantify meaningful storage resource usage and generate corresponding work report in a reliable way.
indexproduct.twocontent: Crust's GPoS (Guaranteed Proof of Stake) consensus uses storage resources as a guarantee. It encourages nodes to provide more storage resources, and improves the security and robustness of the network.
indexproduct.threecontent: With GPoS consensus and MPoW mechanism, Crust is able to support the quantification and consensus of both storage and computing resource usage, and builds ubiquitous decentralized cloud storage and computing capabilities.

decentralized.title: Use Crust to Connect to Decentralized Cloud
decentralized.checkMore: Check more details from Crust Application Brief
decentralized.serverlessSubTitle: Developers are able to deploy their own Dapps/websites based on Crust/IPFS Network. With this, developers are able to only focus on building Dapps/websites, no need for server management. Moreover, Crust Network incentives multiple nodes to store Dapp/website files and provide storage services, thus ensuring the high availability of Dapps/websites.
decentralized.generalSubTitle: Some blockchain-based decentralized applications, such as NFT and decentralized social platforms, involve a large amount of user data, far beyond the on-chain storage capacity. Based on Crust/IPFS Network, developers can provide general off-chain data storage services for these applications.
decentralized.AcceleratedSubTitle: Developers are able to build P2P content delivery network (CDN) services with Crust/IPFS Network. Crust Network incentivizes the nodes to spontaneously distribute CDN data and play the role of CDN edge nodes to accelerate the data transmission for CDN users.
decentralized.SecuredSubTitle: Developers are able to build Cloud storage applications with Crust/IPFS Network. Without maintaining storage clusters, developers only need to integrate the SDK of Crust/IPFS into applications to provide users with stable storage services.
decentralized.apply-now-prefix: Apply for Crust Grants and join us for building the Web 3.0 decentralized cloud ecosystem.
decentralized.dev-team: Crust is an Open Source Protocol
decentralized.dev-team-intro: Crust is an open source project funded by Decentralized Cloud Foundation. It is under active development and maintenance by Clouderium Technologies. Clouderium is specialized in research and development of trusted computing, blockchain, and cloud storage.
decentralized.foundation-intro: DCF (Decentralized Cloud Foundation) funds and incubates teams and projects, to build decentralized cloud infrastructure and applications of Web3.0. Crust Network is the fundamental project that DCF mainly supports.

members.name: Bova Chen
members.title: Co-Founder
members.desc: He has 15+ yrs experience of financial investment. He started as TMT researcher and then managed several funds as investment director. He founded Winsun Capital and did successful investments in crypto industry.

members.name: Leo Wang
members.title: Co-Founder
members.desc: He has 15+ yrs experience in IT industry. Leo worked in Microsoft and Cisco as senior development lead. He got rich experience in distributed storage, cloud computing and blockchain, and led a blockchain-based project to store and exchange manufacturing data in different geo-locations.

members.name: Zikun Fan
members.title: Technical Lead
members.desc: He got his master degree in Computer Science from ZheJiang University and received the PhD offer from CERCS Lab of Georgia Tech. Zikun worked in Microsoft on Azure Kubernetes and blockchain based projects.

members.name: Steve Shi
members.title: Market Lead
members.desc: He got 10+ yrs experience of marketing, program operation and new product management in IT Industry. Steve got both his master degree and MBA from Shanghai Jiaotong University. He worked in Cisco to support new product global launch business.

members.name: Dean Yan
members.title: Product Lead
members.desc: Dean is experienced in information security and blockchain technologies. He has been working in Cisco on supply chain blockchain based projects, one of his innovation projects was announced in global Development@Cisco conference.

members.name: Yang Zhao
members.title: Core Developer
members.desc: Yang got his master's degree from Tsinghua University. He has participated in open source projects and made significant contributions. Yang worked in Microsoft on cyber security, distributed storage and big data projects.

members.name: Yao Zhao
members.title: Core Developer
members.desc: Yao got his master’s degree from Shanghai Jiaotong University. He is experienced in Data security and Linux kernel technologies. Yao worked in Cisco IT security department and participated several blockchain projects.
